title: examplens
author: examplens
content: another exchange is going down in history.The bear market is starting to take all poorly profitable businessesEffective December 31, 2022, they will be removing all markets and disabling deposits on the qTrade.io platformWithdrawals will be available for at least a year, but after March 31, 2023, they may be manually processed. it is probably desirable to make a withdrawal as soon as possible and at the latest end of March 2023.full statement https://qtradehelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/11423085662733

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: My first time hearing about this exchange but at least they will to give their customers time to withdraw their assets unlike some that just decided to pause withdrawals and then shutdown.It's really a very hard time for crypto businesses. Whoever makes it through this crypto winter will have gone against many odds.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I have just checked about this exchange, reported every 24 hours volume for over a long time now is not much, seeing around $20000 or less is surprising me, trading on the exchange would be with difficulty, the trades will not not be filled in time. I am wondering that some people are still using the exchange after such very low volume.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on December 16, 2022, 11:09:39 PMI am wondering that some people are still using the exchange after such very low volume. there are some altcoins with medium-sized communities listed on this exchange. Somehow, they maintained the trading volume on it, and that kept them alive. now some of them have sunk, which obviously had a significant impact on the functioning of this exchange.
